alert.note: Alert for Canadian; Grady (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 22 at 7:15PM CDT until June 22 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN KINGFISHER...NORTHWESTERN GRADY...NORTHEASTERN CADDO...SOUTHEASTERN BLAINE AND WESTERN CANADIAN COUNTIES... At 714 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles south of Greenfield to 8 miles southwest of El Reno to near Gracemont, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... El Reno, Hinton, Geary, Binger, Calumet, Gracemont, Lookeba, Bridgeport, Greenfield, Cogar, Concho, Albert, and Cedar Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
